summary.Title: BARTENDER BALTHAZAR CHAMPAGNE BAR

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
BALTHAZAR CHAMPAGNE BAR IS LOOKING FOR A BARTENDER

Are you passionate about champagne & cocktails? Do you have the drive to develop and nurture working relationships, both with our guests and within your workplace? Then we can´t wait to hear from you!  We are looking for a sparkling part time Bartender to join our motivated team in the best Champagne bar!

WE OFFER
An exciting working day in an international environment in Copenhagen unique Champagne Bar. We are a young and dynamic team, who together delivers a personal, stylish and elegant service of the highest international standard.

ABOUT THE JOB
As part of the Bartenders team at Balthazar, you will take part in creating new exciting cocktails for our always-evolving drinks menu. Along with your colleagues, you will maintain high guest loyalty throughout high guest satisfaction and ensure that all guests receive a unique and magical experience. And yes, we are up late at night, but isn´t it the best time to enjoy champagne?

WE EXPECT
That you have previous experience as bartender in a high end bar or restaurant. You have a wide knowledge of quality drinks & modern cocktails. You are flexible with your working hours. You are sincerely passionate and engaged both with guests and employees. In other words with your professional skills and outgoing personality, we expect that you will be able to create unique results and experiences for our guests at any time. And of course, you love champagne!

ABOUT BALTHAZAR & D’ANGLETERRE
At Balthazar & the d'Angleterre, we know that it is the people behind who makes the difference when it comes to service and luxury. Therefore, we seek to engage not only employees with a high level of experience and education, but also dynamic, pragmatic and flexible people with the right attitude and with a highly developed sense of guest service and 5-star luxury.
